summary: Automation and community app for Discord and Twitch with AI-powered game development assistance, finance tracking, and social features
architectural_notes: Admin system requires role-based access control (RBAC) with owner role
Subscription management interface should be restricted to admin/owner access only
Owner Twitch profile link should be displayed prominently in the UI for promotional purposes
Affiliate/partner status toggle requires subscription check for non-owner users
AI assistant integration should support project creation workflows (e.g., game development)
Finance tracking system requires secure storage of financial data
Donation system wallet linking must support multiple payment providers
Color scheme: purple and pink as primary brand colors throughout UI
Chat room feature requires real-time messaging infrastructure
Discord server management requires Discord API integration with bot permissions
known_issues: Admin login causing simultaneous user login
Tracking page not separated from admin dashboard
